projects.name: Beacon: intelligent news aggregation platform
projects.description: A web platform which scrapes preconfigured news sites, classifies the articles and extracts topic information from them, then makes the articles searchable using the extracted labels and the text content.
highlights: Categorization of articles and topic modeling

projects.name: Xtracto: document digitalization web app
projects.description: A web app which can generate an editable Microsoft Word file from the image of a document. It uses document region recognition in conjunction with optical character recognition for text extraction.
highlights: Text, title and image region recognition
